tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My both kids are born preterm and Dr. Neelima treated them. One is 30 weeker and another one is 34 weeker. She took care of my kids very well, treated with precision. Dont recommend medicine if not necessary. My both kids are doing well now. *** ** *** **** ******** ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: the doctor is very friendly, concerning and caring. she listens to the patient, goes through reports, doesn't rush and also doesn't prolong discussion. importantly doesn't give medicines unnecessarily.
